RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRON BERTIE was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and widened late to win as much the best. ICY RAIN had good position early, rallied in the stretch, was no match for the winner late but was second best. DANCING FOR MONEY chased the winner on the inside and faltered in the stretch. IMA SURE BET was unhurried early and was no threat late. STRAIGHT TO GO allowed to settle, failed to menace. SUPER GEUSE raced close up early and tired on the far turn.

ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position early, rallied in the stretch, was no match for

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, failed to menace,

ENTRY.COMMENT: raced close up, early and tired on the far turn

ENTRY.COMMENT: was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and wi

ENTRY.COMMENT: was unhurried early, and was no threat late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 18400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances). .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAMBITI was never far back early, rallied down the backside on the inside, angled off the rail at the top of the stretch, closed stoutly and drew clear late under firm handling. DREAM PRIZES chased the early speed, rallied in the stretch three wide, could not match strides late with the winner but was second best. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA broke alertly and quick made the lead, remained clear in mid stretch and weakened late. BOOT LEGGER was allowed to settle, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat late. JACK BE FAST allowed to settle, lacked a bid and went evenly. IT'S A MANS WORLD raced close up early and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LED TASSO tracked three wide early, rallied on the turn and drew even, prevailed after a long drive under strong handling. WARHORSE WEST dueled on the lead the entire trip, held grudgingly in the stretch battle and just missed. BARRELHOUSE was in tight early on the inside, dropped back on the turn, came again in the stretch, closed fast and gaining late. OUTSLEWTHEM had good position on the inside and finished willingly. TIMESATAPPIN never far back, lacked a late bid and went evenly . NAPA DUDE was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 17000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN THE LAST 5 STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 1 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS HALIME pressed the pace throughout, rallied in late stretch and was edged clear under strong handling. BOURBON SOCIAL set the pace until deep stretch, held grudgingly and just.missed LOADED ONCE MORE was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch four wide and closed fast. ORBIT MARS raced close up on the inside and weakened late. MISS OVER THERE contended three wide and lacked a late response. JOLIE RULER was no factor. ESPECIALLY YOU had brief foot on the inside and gave way.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY BROTHER CAM tracked four wide, rallied on the far turn with a quick move, drew off in the stretch under firm handling. PATIO PARTY was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was hooked at the top of the stretch by the winner, could not match strides late but was clearly second best. MONEY FOR MISCHIEF was unhurried early, angled out five wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. BIG FRANK raced mid pack and went evenly. FIGHTVILLE pressed the pace for three quarters, then weakened. MASTER OF WAR was outrun. WINWITHJIMMY contended early and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 34. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCKEYE CHARLIE had an awkward start, settled three wide, rallied at the quarter pole and drew close, drew off late under left handed urging. RAY'S EMPIRE dueled early, gained a clear lead on the turn, was outfinished late bur held place. MISS ELLIE had good position early, rallied at the quarter pole, but in her bid and hung late. OXBOW'S RIDE was allowed to settle and failed to menace. FAST AS FAST CAN B had speed for a half, then stopped.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 1. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPER DONNA G chased the early speed, rallied on the far turn, gained the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off late under a strong hand ride.. VIVE EL MOMENTO was allowed to settle early, rallied on the far turn and drew close,, was no match late for the winner but held place. GALILEO'S AFFAIR raced mid pack early, had a mild bid late while no threat. PRANCIPANTS was unhurried early, angled out four wide in the stretch and hung late. MISS HEART was slow early and passed tiring rivals. DESIGNATE had good position early and was through after a half. KEYPIT set the pace for five eights, then gave way. FLECK had brief foot and was through early.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 91. Starter Allowance Purse 17000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN THE LAST 5 STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 1 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Con sidered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUGER pressed the early pace, rallied at the quarter pole and drew close drew off late under strong handling. D'MONEY HONEY was never far back, rallied three wide at the quarter pole, was no match late but was second best. GEHRIG set the pace for a half, then gradually weakened. INHERENT POWERS was unhurried early, angled in to the rail in the stretch and was no threat. SKIDSTREAM allowed to settle, failed to menace. GOTTAGETITBACK had good position on the inside, steadied near the wire and weakened. UHAVETOBEKITTENME raced mid pack and had no rally. The rider of GOTTAGEITBACK claimed foul against the rider of INHERENT POWERS for alleged interference in late stretch. After viewing the tape the stewards took no action.
